name: The Fool
description: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life
love: The start of a new romance, but it may be set on superficial, shallow means. A young, exciting love.

name: The Magician
love: All the tools are there to make the relationship work. You and your partner will use all you have at your disposal. Pay attention to other cards for the outcome.

name: The High Priestess
love: Listen to your gut feeling about this relationship. If it feels right, you will feel spirtually fulfilled. If it seems wrong, don't ignore it.

name: The Empress
love: A commited relationship is indicated. Maybe raising a child together, or could raise one together. A loving, nuturing relationship.

name: The Emperor
love: Your partner seems to have masculine energy. They are an older or more mature person. They are authoritative. Found your Yang to your Yin?

name: The Hierophant
love: If not in a commited relationship yet, you will be in one. You and your partner shared the same morals and values. You two meet eye to eye on spirtual matters.

name: The Lovers
love: You have found your soulmate, your other half. Romance and a deep connection is here.

name: The Chariot
love: Use your willpower to power thorough this relationship. Have trust, love can prevail in the end.

name: Strength
love: If single, now is a good time to go out and meet someone new! If in a relationship, you have become stronger together. A good emotional bond.

name: The Hermit
love: May need to find yourself, and self-reflect first before jumping or continuing with the relationship.

name: Wheel of Fortune
love: If single, it's time to put yourself out there and meet new people! If with a partner, you got lucky!

name: Justice
love: The truth, will come out in this relationship. No secrets, all will be revealed.

name: The Hanged Man
love: If you are unhappy, it is time to walk away from the relationship. Holding to feelings of an ex, it is time to release them.

name: Death
love: The next phase of the relationship is to come. A proposal, a change in the progression of the relationship. If single, the start of a new relationship.

name: Temperance
love: A nice quiet romance is here. Mutual understanding and soulmate level love.

name: The Devil
love: A superfiical relationship with not much depth. With each other or liking someone for the wrong reasons.

name: The Tower
love: The ending of a relationship. A bad breakup that you are trying to handle.

name: The Star
love: Make a wish, and the right person for you will come. Make a wish in the relationship right now and it will be your command.

name: The Moon
love: Emotionally the person that you are focusing on can cause a lot of strees and insecurity.

name: The Sun
love: A happy relationship is in the works. Much love and warmth.

name: Judgement
love: Time to reassess the relationship and weigh the pros and cons. If single, figure out what it is you like and dislike, really think on it, and choose accordingly.

name: The World
love: Good things will happen for you romantically. If single, the world wants to give you love! Just go out there!
